title: President Donald J. Trump is Pressuring the Nicaraguan Regime to Restore Democracy and the Rule of Law â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
November 27, 2018
All people deserve a government that cares for their safety, their interests, and their wellbeing, including their prosperity.
						President Donald J. Trump					COMMITTED TO LIBERTY, DEMOCRACY, AND THE RULE OF LAW: President Donald J. Trump is taking a strong stand against the corrupt Nicaraguan regime.IMPOSING SANCTIONS: The Trump Administration is imposing targeted sanctions against high-level officials from the Nicaraguan regime and their supporters.STANDING UP TO AUTOCRATIC REGIMES: President Trump is confronting regimes in the region that disregard democracy and degrade security and stability in the hemisphere.
